DungeonData.Intro:
The Beginner's Cave has been set up by the Warlord as a service to all Free Adventurers, giving them a chance to try their skills in a not-too-dangerous setting. Let us all toast the Warlord for restocking the cave daily!
You have no trouble finding a horse that you, well, borrow to take you to the site of your first adventure. You follow several signs which lead you to the Beginner's Cave.

Room.Name: Entrance
Room.Title: Cave Entrance
Room.Description: The entrance is to the south with a sign over it reading, "Beginners Only!". To the north is the road back to town.
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the cave entrance.

Room.Name: Tunnel
Room.Title: Dark north/south tunnel
Room.Description: To the north you see bright light streaming in from outside. To the south you see flickering torch light, but you cannot make out any details.
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a dark north/south tunnel.

Room.Name: Chamber
Room.Title: Large Chamber
Room.Description: You are in a large chamber where the roof rises out of sight. Burning torches line the walls making it easy to see. Tunnels lead north and south, and there are small chambers to the east and west.
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a large chamber.

Room.Name: WestChamber
Room.Title: West Side Chamber
Room.Description: It is very cold here and the only light comes in dimly from the large chamber to the east.
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the west side chamber.

Room.Name: EastChamber
Room.Title: East Side Chamber
Room.Description: It is very cold here and the only light comes in dimly from the large chamber to the west.
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the east side chamber.

Room.Name: NorthPassage
Room.Title: North passage
Room.Description: A tunnel goes north and east and west are doors that are bolted shut. (Locking something in?). In the dim light you can see that the hall goes south but you cannot make out any details.
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the north end of a long passage.

Room.Name: WestCell
Room.Title: West Cell
Room.Description: You are in a small stark cell with a door on the east side of the room.
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a west cell.

Room.Name: EastCell
Room.Title: East Cell
Room.Description: You are in a small stark cell with a door on the west side of the room.
Room.ShortDescription: You are in an east cell.

Room.Name: MiddlePassage
Room.Title: Middle passage
Room.Description: Doors are bolted on both sides of you (east and west). The hall extends north and south.
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the middle of a long passage.

Room.Name: WestCell2
Room.Title: West Cell
Room.Description: You are in a small stark cell with a door on the east side of the room.
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a west cell.

Room.Name: EastCell2
Room.Title: East Cell
Room.Description: You are in a small stark cell with a door on the west side of the room.
Room.ShortDescription: You are in an east cell.

Room.Name: SouthPassage
Room.Title: South passage
Room.Description: To your great shock there are doors to the east and west. The hall goes north from here and a broken tunnel goes south.
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the south end of a long passage.

Room.Name: WestCell3
Room.Title: West Cell
Room.Description: You are in a small stark cell with a door on the east side of the room.
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a west cell.

Room.Name: EastCell3
Room.Title: East Cell
Room.Description: You are in a small stark cell with a door on the west side of the room.
Room.ShortDescription: You are in an east cell.

Room.Name: BrokenTunnel
Room.Title: Broken north/south tunnel
Room.Description: The sides of the tunnel are very broken and rough. You see torch light to the south. The east wall has a smooth shape in the center, about the size of a door.
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a dark north/south tunnel.

action.text: You've found a hidden tunnel going off to the east!

Room.Name: HiddenTunnel
Room.Title: Secret Passage
Room.Description: You are in a secret east/west passage. You hear a faint melody coming from the east.
Room.ShortDescription: You are in an east/west tunnel with faint music.

Room.Name: HiddenTunnel2
Room.Title: Secret Passage
Room.Description: You can very clearly hear religious music being played and can smell incense from the east.
Room.ShortDescription: You are in an east/west tunnel with loud music.

Room.Name: Temple
Room.Title: Temple
Room.Description: You are in a temple that has paintings of great deeds covering the walls. There are two altars here, one covered with gold paint and the other stained with blood. The only exit leads to the west.
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the temple.

Room.Name: T-Intersection
Room.Title: T-Intersection
Room.Description: A brightly burning torch is bolted to the south wall. Dark tunnels lead north and east. To the west is a place where once a door stood, but it has been torn from its hinges.
Room.ShortDescription: You are at a T-Intersection; North by E/W.

Room.Name: Library
Room.Title: Library
Room.Description: You are in what was obviously once a library. Most of the books have been destroyed, with the scraps left lying on the ground. A door, torn from its hinges, also lies on the floor. The exit is to the east.
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the library.

Room.Name: EWTunnel
Room.Title: East/West Tunnel
Room.Description: You are in an unremarkable tunnel. You can see torch light in both directions.
Room.ShortDescription: You are in an east/west tunnel.

Room.Name: TopStairway
Room.Title: Top of a Stairway
Room.Description: You are at an unremarkable stone landing at the top of a flight of stairs. A single torch is bolted to the wall. A tunnel leads back west. It looks very dark down there...
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the top of a stairway.

Room.Name: BottomStairway
Room.Title: Bottom of a Stairway
Room.Description: You are at an unremarkable stone landing at the bottom of a flight of stairs. A light can be seen at the top and a very dim light can be seen down the tunnel to the east.
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the bottom of a stairway.

Room.Name: EWTunnel2
Room.Title: East/West Tunnel
Room.Description: You are in a very rough tunnel carved out of a series of natural caverns. Dim light can be seen in both directions.
Room.ShortDescription: You are in an east/west tunnel.

Room.Name: SaltyTunnel
Room.Title: East/West Tunnel
Room.Description: You see light to the east, and feel a cool wind coming from there. In the wind you smell a hint of salt.
Room.ShortDescription: You are in an east/west tunnel smelling of salt.

Room.Name: PiratesCove
Room.Title: Pirate's Cove
Room.Description: You are at a small bay. Cliffs rise on either side of you so that the only exit is back in the tunnel to the west. A broken old boat is resting on the bank of the rough and stormy sea. All around you is salt water, as far as the eye can see.
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the Pirate's Cove.

Monster.Name: Rat
Monster.Description: You see three huge rats charging at you! One is black, one is brown, and one is tan. Each one has sharp white teeth.

AutoCorpse.Description: You see the hacked up body of what was once a huge rat.

Monster.Name: Hermit
Monster.Description: There is a grizzled old hermit (who smells as if he hasn't taken a bath in forty years) in the room.

AutoCorpse.Description: You see the hermit's smelly body lying crumpled on the floor.

Monster.Name: Heinrich
Monster.Description: A human warrior stands before you, armed with a longsword and carrying a shield. On his shield is a sticker which says, "Hi, I'm Heinrich!"

AutoCorpse.Description: Heinrich's body lies on the floor here. You can still picture that sticker saying, "Hi, I'm Heinrich!"

Monster.Name: Gorilla
Monster.Description: There is a huge, hairy, strong and angry gorilla in the room with you!

AutoCorpse.Description: You see the shaggy corpse of a dead gorilla.

Monster.Name: Mimic
Monster.Description: A chest-shaped monster is in the room, holding you with two tentacles and attempting to dissassemble you with a third one.

action.text: As the mimic dies, it rolls over and you find an unmarked gold ring!

AutoCorpse.Description: The dead mimic lies in a formless blob on the floor.

Monster.Name: Priest
Monster.Description: There is a huge man in religious garb with an insane look on his face here. In his right hand, he carries a mace.

AutoCorpse.Description: The priest's corpse lies on the floor, his face frozen in a fanatic's sneer.

Monster.Name: Cynthia
Monster.Description: You see a beautiful girl in a flowing white dress. You recognize her as Cynthia Luxom, Duke Luxom's not-too-bright daughter.

AutoCorpse.Description: Cynthia's body lies sprawled here, a pitiful sight.

Monster.Name: Pirate
Monster.Description: You see a man with a beard and a brass ring in his ear. He is wearing clothes made out of silk and is wielding a very fancily engraved sword.

action.text: As the Pirate chokes and dies, the flame on his sword also dies.

AutoCorpse.Description: The body of the Pirate, his fine-looking clothing now slashed and bloody, lies here.

Item.name: diamonds
Item.description: You see a large pile of gleaming diamonds here!

Item.name: bottle
Item.description: There is a bottle with a strange potion inside of it here! It has a label stuck to it that you could READ.

Item.name: sack of coins
Item.description: You find a sack with 50 gold coins inside!

Item.name: Chest
Item.description: There is a large chest in the center of the room.

action.text: As you approach the chest, it suddenly comes alive and two tentacles come out of the sides, holding you fast. Another tentacle rises from the top and attempts to hurt you.

Item.name: ring
Item.description: As the mimic dies, it rolls over and you find an unmarked gold ring!

Item.name: spices
Item.description: You find several spices. They are of a rare variety and quite valuable.

Item.name: book
Item.description: There is an old book here. It glows in the darkness and is remarkably well preserved.

action.text: As you read the book, you feel a wierd sesnsation overtaking you. You are turning into a small fish!\n\nYou flop three times and die.

Item.name: jewels
Item.description: There is a large pile of jewels here!

Item.name: axe
Item.description: You see a standard Marcos axe here.

Item.name: sword
Item.description: There is a poor quality Marcos sword here.

Item.name: mace
Item.description: There is a high quality Marcos mace here.

Item.name: TrollsFire
Item.description: The pirate was carrying a beautiful sword. Carved on the hilt, in intricate detail, is the sword's name, "TrollsFire".

action.text: As you say the sword's name, bright green flames appear around the blade.
action.description:
The pirate was carrying a beautiful sword. Carved on the hilt, in intricate detail, is the sword's name, "TrollsFire".
Trollsfire is glowing!

action.text: As you say the sword's name, the bright green flames disappears from it.
action.description: The pirate was carrying a beautiful sword. Carved on the hilt, in intricate detail, is the sword's name, "TrollsFire".
